review: Easy to set up and use.  Exceeded my expectations.
author: oddly enough

review: I am shocked at how wonderful this small device is. It was easy to set up. It is easy to navigate. Frankly, I think it is the best device like this for the money.
author: Crystal Shepherd

review: I LOVE THE FIRE STICK..  MY GRANDSON MASTERED THE SETUP IN NO TIME.  OPERATES ALL THE TIME VS ONCE IN A WHILE OR NOT AT ALL LIKE ONE OF THE MAJOR BRANDS I TRIED. PLUS IT'S OFFERED AT  A MUCH MORE COMPETITIVE PRICE..
author: CRY BABY

review: Only wish I could go on the internet on here
author: Garrett

review: Totally the best option for viewing tv, it's open source so you are able to add additional options for viewing. A great bargain for the money. I would highly recommend this to anyone.
author: albert valles

review: Replaced my Chromecast with this and have been very happy.One noticable missing feature as of this review is Prime Music Stations.  You can play playlists that you have favorited, but cannot listen to the stations available to Amazon Prime members.
author: Shawn Bescheinen

review: Super easy to "hook up" and works like a charm. YAY!!!
author: Alison

review: Love it and th HD looks great!
author: Aryca Westfall
